nodes.text: The Roshu Sune was a radical splinter group of the Gotal Assembly for Separation active during the Separatist Crisis. It advocated for the secession of the moon of Antar 4 from the Galactic Republic and instead aligning with the Confederacy of Independent Systems, doing so in a protracted terrorist bombing campaign. Following the outbreak of the Clone Wars in 22 BBY, the Republic loyalists lost power and the group was successful in seeing the moon's fall to the Separatists.
